mapper.select: SELECT RWMX_ID, RWMX_MID,RWMX_DWMC,RWMX_DWBH, RWMX_DWID,RWMX_BMMC,RWMX_BMBH,RWMX_BMID, RWMX_TBR,RWMX_TBRID,to_char(RWMX_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd') RWMX_TBRQ,RWMX_NOTE,RWMX_SJDH,RWMX_GPS,RWMX_SJLX,RWMX_SJSM, RWMX_JJD,RWMX_TP,RWMX_SP,RWMX_ZH,to_char(RWMX_FXSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd')RWMX_FXSJ, RWMX_SHLX,RWMX_BHLX,RWMX_BHSL,RWMX_KHNR,RWMX_CD,RWMX_CZFS from XCSB
